r.d: Mailparse is an extension for parsing and working with email messages. It can deal with rfc822 and rfc2045 (MIME) compliant messages.
r.n: - Fix #73110: Mails with unknown MIME version are treated as plain/text. (cmb) - Fix #74233: Parsing multi Content-Disposition causes memory leak. (cmb) - Fix #75825: mailparse_uudecode_all doesn't parse multiple files. (cmb) - Fix #81422: Potential double-free in mailparse_uudecode_all(). (cmb) - Fix gh#19 Segmentation fault with PHP 8.1 in extract_body using MAILPARSE_EXTRACT_RETURN. (Remi)
